Get a movie's release details

Source: R/trakt-movies-releases-boxoffice.R
trakt.movies.releases.Rd

Retrieve one or more movie's release information, including the release date, country code (two letter, e.g. us), and the certification (e.g. PG).

trakt.movies.releases(target, country = NULL)

Arguments

target

character(1): The ID of the item requested. Preferably the Trakt ID (e.g. 1390), slug (e.g. "game-of-thrones"), or IMDb ID (e.g. "tt0944947"). Can also be of length greater than 1, in which case the function is called on all target values separately and the result is combined.
country

Optional two letter country code to filter by.

Value

A tibble().

Note

See the trakt API docs for further info

See also

Other movie data: trakt.movies.boxoffice

Examples

trakt.movies.releases("tron-legacy-2010")
#> # A tibble: 19 x 6
#>    country certification release_date release_type note                  movie  
#>    <chr>   <chr>         <chr>        <chr>        <chr>                 <chr>
